TopicTitle: The unfortunate abuse of nuclear pulse drives (the Orion drive MEGATHREAD)

Articles.Content:
Basically, post your Orion Drive mod related creations here!

I mean, there should be different ways to abuse it, play with it, and exploit it, you know.

You can get it here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/28428-Orion-aka-Ol-Boom-boom
